Agile_Technique.name: Agile Technique
Agile_Technique.description: Unlocks the ability to triple jump, dash jump, and bounce. Double tap $DASHINPUT to dash jump, and hold to bounce.

ranks.description: Unlocks the ability to triple jump, dash jump, and bounce. Double tap $DASHINPUT to dash jump, and hold to bounce.

Volley.name: Volley
Volley.description:
Fires a projectile in the air, raining shrapnel within a radius below. 

Deals $DMG constant damage to targets in the area.

ranks.description:
Fires a projectile in the air, raining shrapnel within a radius below. 

Deals $DMG constant damage to targets in the area.

Pay_Day.name: Pay Day
Pay_Day.description: Mugs adjacent targets, dealing $DMG damage. Hit targets will be mugged and stunned, dropping currency when hit. Previously mugged targets will not drop currency again.

ranks.description: Mugs adjacent targets, dealing $DMG damage. Hit targets will be mugged and stunned, dropping currency when hit. Previously mugged targets will not drop currency again.

Bomb_Trap.name: Bomb Trap
Bomb_Trap.description: Places an explosive trap that triggers within proximity of nearby targets, dealing $DMG damage.

ranks.description: Places an explosive trap that triggers within proximity of nearby targets, dealing $DMG damage.

Mist_Veil.name: Mist Veil
Mist_Veil.description: Evokes a mist, vanishing the caster and healing for a short time while invisible.

ranks.description: Evokes a mist, vanishing the caster and healing for a short time while invisible.

Killer_Jab.name: Killer Jab
Killer_Jab.description: Strikes nearby targets, dealing $DMG damage. Applies a poison condition.

ranks.description: Strikes nearby targets, dealing $DMG damage. Applies a poison condition.

Venom_Shot.name: Venom Shot
Venom_Shot.description: Shoots a venom coated projectile, dealing $DMG damage. Applies a poison condition.

ranks.description: Shoots a venom coated projectile, dealing $DMG damage. Applies a poison condition.

Avoidance.name: Avoidance
Avoidance.description: Applies a 15% evasion bonus, additionally enhancing initial movement speed and dash speed.

ranks.description: Applies a 15% evasion bonus, additionally enhancing initial movement speed and dash speed.

Devious_Signet.name: Devious Signet
Devious_Signet.description: Applies an energizing, dexterious boon to the caster and nearby allies.

ranks.description: Applies an energizing, dexterious boon to the caster and nearby allies.

Caltrops.name: Caltrops
Caltrops.description: Places a trap that surrounds the caster, dealing $DMG constant damage to targets within the radius.

ranks.description: Places a trap that surrounds the caster, dealing $DMG constant damage to targets within the radius.
